title: Skill checks
content: When a character desires to do anything, where the outcome of the action is not obvious,the character needs to perform a skill check. To perform an skill check roll a d20 + attribute die (if any) + skill die (if any) and record the total. To succeed on a skill check the total needs to match or exceed the check's difficulty. If none of the skills presented fits the character's desired activity, simply roll the attribute die twice.
